clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of the Effect of LANAP as an Adjunct Treatment in Management of Patients With Chronic Periodontitis
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of the Effect of LANAP (Laser Assisted New Attachment Procedure) as an Adjunct Treatment in Management of Patients With Chronic Periodontitis( Randomized Clinical Trial Study)

brief_summary.textblock: this study evaluate the effect of LANAP (Laser Assisted New Attachment Procedure) as an Adjunct Treatment in Management of Patients With Chronic Periodontitis and assay the effect of LANAP on periodontal indexes like BOP, CAL, probing depth

detailed_description.textblock: this study evaluate the effect of LANAP (Laser Assisted New Attachment Procedure) as an Adjunct Treatment in Management of Patients With Chronic Periodontitis and assay the effect of LANAP on periodontal indexes like BOP, CAL, probing depth in a split mouth design before treatment and after follow up sessions.

primary_outcome.description: depth of periodontal pocket of each tooth

secondary_outcome.description: sign of bleeding after 1 minutes post probing the tooth pocket

secondary_outcome.measure: change of Full Mouth Bleeding Score
secondary_outcome.description: Bleeding Score of all teeth that is calculated by counting the Four dental levels that have sign of bleeding post probing (including , mesio-buccal,mid- buccal, disto-buccal and lingual) divided by the total number of total teeth in the mouth *4
distance from depth of tooth sulcus to cemento-enamel junction

secondary_outcome.measure: change of Full Mouth Plaque Score
secondary_outcome.description: the number of 4 surfaces of each tooth(mesiobuccal, mid buccal, disto buccal and lingual surfaces) that have plaque that is disclosed by disclosing tables , then counting the number of the colored surface of all teeth divided by the total number of total teeth in the mouth*4

intervention.description: radiation of Nd:YAG laser in periodontal pocket
radiation of Nd:YAG laser in off mode in periodontal pocket

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- definite diagnosis of chronic periodontitis with at least two teeth with periodontal pocket depth more than 4 mm in each side
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnant smoker systemic disease breast feeding
